taskDescription: Drag and drop the missing words into the sentences to learn about the history of tea:
textField: Tea has been around for centuries - it was discovered in China *hundreds* of years ago, and it *spread* to Japan and the rest of the world. The *earliest* known tea ceremony is thought to be from the 3rd century AD, and tea was first *imported* to England in the 1600s. Today, tea is *enjoyed* around the world in different ways and continues to be an important part of culture and daily life.
resetDropDescription: Are you sure you want to reset this drop zone?
a11yCheck: Check the answers. The responses will be marked as correct, incorrect, or unanswered.
a11yShowSolution: Show the solution. The task will be marked with its correct solution.
a11yRetry: Retry the task. Reset all responses and start the task over again.
